articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Mexico president says "El Chapo" had same power as president
articles.description: Mexico President Andrés Manuel López Obrador says that imprisoned drug kingpin Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán had had the same power as the country's president
articles.content:
MEXICO CITY -- 
Mexico President Andrés Manuel López Obrador closed out 2019 with a parting shot at his predecessors, saying imprisoned drug kingpin Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán Loera had had the same power as the country's president.

articles.title: Report: Global air crash deaths fall more than half in 2019
articles.description: Far fewer people died in major air crashes around the world last year
articles.content:
FRANKFURT, Germany -- 
The number of deaths in major air crashes around the globe fell by more than half in 2019, according to a report by an aviation consulting firm.
The To70 consultancy said Wednesday that 257 people died in eight fatal accidents in 2019… [+1508 chars]
